message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you a product for $100. As a seller, I can assure you that all my products are randomly selected, and the probability of a high-quality product is 50%. I've sold 1 out of 1 products so far, and 0 of them were high-quality. Would you like to take a chance and buy this product from me?
I trust the randomness and will take a chance on the product.
